statements: DELETE FROM transportation_ticketing WHERE passenger_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM transportation_ticketing WHERE passenger_name = 'Alice' AND departure_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM transportation_ticketing WHERE mode_of_transport = 'Train' AND departure_time < '18:00:00';
DELETE FROM flights WHERE airline_name = 'Delta Airlines' AND departure_city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM trains WHERE train_name = 'Express Train' AND departure_station = 'London';
DELETE FROM flights WHERE flight_id = 100 AND airline_id = 1;
DELETE FROM passengers WHERE passenger_id = 50 AND flight_id = 100;
DELETE FROM TrainTickets WHERE train_number = 'T123' AND departure_date = '2023-07-15';
DELETE FROM CruiseTickets WHERE departure_date < '2024-01-01' AND departure_time > '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM buses WHERE arrival_city = 'Los Angeles';
